text: @SpeakerPelosi Why pretend #NancyPelosi everybody knows you don’t pray and what you’re wanting is more deaths because you’re hoping it will help you in the November election, why were  #Democrats purposely sending COVID-19 patients to retirement homes and care facilities ?! https://t.co/Lj5zZQ9J2o
